description:
This pleasant circular walk passes through the woods and villages around the rural area of Berry's Green in Bromley . 
Highlights on the walk include the pretty village of Cudham and views of Biggin Hill Airport and Cherry Lodge Golf Club. The circular route runs for about 8 miles on reasonably flat trails with some fairly small climbs on the way.
